Description: Limestone ostracon containing an administrative text/receipt written in Coptic and Greek.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Henri Édouard Naville (1893-94, on behalf of EEF)
Bibliographic references: Till 1964 / Die koptischen Rechtsurkunden aus Theben (p.64)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (390703) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/390703)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.Crum 318 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
